H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

40.gl: to hold, carry, have (in one's luggage)

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H6453.def: = festival commemorating the time in Egypt when God killed the first-born of Egypt but spared the Israelites

H2889.def: = state in which an object is free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H4768.def: = state in which a selected group of objects is greater in number than the rest of the group

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H4519.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3485.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ ninth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and fifth son of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H2074.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and sixth son of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H2891.def: = process by which an area or object becomes free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6453.def: = festival commemorating the time in Egypt when God killed the first-born of Egypt but spared the Israelites

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H2396.def: = man, also known as {L:Jehizkiah<SDBH:יְחִזְקִיָּה>}; ◄ son of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>}; ► father of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H6419.def: = state in which humans regard an event as likely to happen

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3722.def: = causative action by which humans cover objects with a coating of a certain substance

H1157.def: = path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H1875.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H2893.def: = process by which people become free from contamination, ► as a result of which they can interact socially with others

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H7495.def: = causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans or animals to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself; ≈ often used figuratively to denote the state of a country or nation suffering from the consequences of their unfaithfulness

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2282.def: = celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy

H4682.def: = thin cracker-like bread made without yeast

H5797.def: = state in which an object is able to withstand force

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H2077.def: = the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and the other part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

H505.def: = generic term for domesticated oxen, both male and female; ► kept for milk and used for plowing

H6499.def: = young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
